snippet.title: Shining Flower
snippet.description: Complete play-through of the 1993 CD-ROM Shining Flower. Concept and paintings by Kikuko Iwano. Music by Yamato Hayashi. Direction and animation by Tsuyoshi Kuroda. Published by The Voyager Company.
